h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area
content: The Gray-Bronze Cart health bar will appear as soon as you step onto the bridge, and you'll hear someone shout "Help!". You'll need to work your way down to it, however, by going through the cave.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_5_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection 'Defeat Gray-Bronze Cart'.
The content is as follows:
The Gray-Bronze Cart health bar will appear as soon as you step onto the bridge, and you'll hear someone shout "Help!". You'll need to work your way down to it, however, by going through the cave.
